cards.title: Kyoss
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card, even if they would otherwise be prevented.
One hero may use a power, even if they would otherwise be prevented.
One player may draw a card, even if they would otherwise be prevented.

openingLines.default: As long as this is your route, it will be my function to cease your operation.

cards.title: Empowerment of Friendship
cards.body: Whenever you cause another player to play a card, use a power, or draw a card, add 1 token to this card.
cards.powers: {Kyoss} deals a target X irreducible Energy damage, where X equals the number of tokens on this card. Then, remove this card from the game.

cards.title: Storage Retrieval
body: Search your deck or trash for Empowerment of Friendship and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it afterwards.
Each player may draw a card.

cards.title: Tactical Direction
body: Search your deck or trash for Empowerment of Friendship and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it afterwards.
Discard a card. If you do, one other player may play a card now.

cards.title: Overclocked Enhancer
body: Search your deck or trash for Empowerment of Friendship and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it afterwards.
{Kyoss} may deal herself 2 Lightning damage {H - 1} times. Each time {Kyoss} deals herself damage this way, another hero may use a power.

cards.title: Reroute Assistance
body: When Kyoss is dealt Lightning damage, you may draw a card.
At the end of each players turn, if they skipped either their play or power phase, they may draw a card.

cards.title: Balance Amplifier
body: When Kyoss is dealt Energy damage, increase the next damage dealt by Kyoss by 1.

At the end of your turn, you may select up to two other hero targets. If any targets are selected this way, reduce the next damage dealt by {Kyoss} by 1 and increase the next damage dealt by those targets by 1.

cards.title: Forcefield Projector
cards.powers: Select a hero target. Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn. Reduce Projectile damage dealt to that target by an additional 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Energy Transfusion
body: Select a hero target.
Increase damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Increase the next damage dealt by that target by 1.

cards.title: Repair Subsystem
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {Kyoss} regains 1 HP. You may discard a card to increase this by 1.

cards.title: Energized Chassis
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Kyoss} by 1.
Once per round, when {Kyoss} would be dealt damage, you may discard a card to reduce that damage by 1.

cards.title: Hizaquae Reality
body: At the start of your turn, {Kyoss} may deal herself 2 irreducible energy damage. If she takes no damage this way, destroy this card.
You may change the damage type of each instance of damage.

cards.title: Scan and Counteraction
cards.body: Reveal the top card of a deck, then replace it or discard it. If you replaced it, one player may use a power now.

cards.title: Reboot
body: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw X cards, where X is the number of cards discarded this way.
If you discarded at least 4 cards this way, skip your next play phase.

cards.title: Discharge Grasp
cards.powers: {Kyoss} deals a target 1 lightning damage. Reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 1.

cards.title: Reconfigure Output
body: When this card enters play, search your deck and trash for Empowerment of Friendship, put it into play, and shuffle your trash into your deck.
Whenever {Kyoss} would deal 3 or less damage, you may instead put that many tokens on Empowerment of Friendship.
